The film could focus on the bravery and cunning of King Harold and his soldiers, as well as the ruthless ambition of William the Conqueror. The Eruption of Mount Vesuvius (79 AD): This natural disaster has all the makings of a thrilling and suspenseful movie. Imagine the terrifying scenes of the volcano erupting, burying the nearby cities of Pompeii and Herculaneum under a thick layer of ash and pumice. The movie could explore the lives of the people who lived in the area, their struggles and triumphs, and their tragic fate at the hands of the volcano.
